mapper.sql: code, name, continent, region, surfacearea, indepyear, population, lifeexpectancy, gnp, gnpold, localname, governmentform, headofstate, capital, code2
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM country WHERE code = #{code, jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO country (code, name, continent, region, surfacearea, indepyear, population, lifeexpectancy, gnp, gnpold, localname, governmentform, headofstate, capital, code2) VALUES ( #{code, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{continent, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{region, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{surfaceArea, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{indepYear, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{population, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lifeExpectancy, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gnp, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gNPOld, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{localName, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{governmentForm, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{headOfState, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{capital, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code2, jdbcType=CHAR} )
